channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-10931|2024-09-17T03:37:33.507Z -- zte -- zx10%201800-2s
item.description: The ZXR10 1800-2S before v3.00.40 incorrectly restricts the download of the file directory range for WEB users, resulting in the ability to download any files and cause information leaks such as system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2017-10937|2024-09-17T00:55:35.698Z -- zte -- zxiptv-ucm
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in all versions prior to V2.01.05.09 of the ZTE ZXIPTV-UCM product allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the opertype parameter, resulting in the disclosure of database information.

item.title: CVE-2017-10934|2024-09-17T04:10:07.231Z -- zte -- zxiptv-epg
item.description: All versions prior to V5.09.02.02T4 of the ZTE ZXIPTV-EPG product use the Java RMI service in which the servers use the Apache Commons Collections (ACC) library that may result in Java deserialization vulnerabilities. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit the vulnerabilities by sending a crafted RMI request to execute arbitrary code on the target host.

item.title: CVE-2023-41782|2024-09-17T13:00:29.013Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a DLL hijacking vulnerability in ZTE ZXCLOUD iRAI, an attacker could place a fake DLL file in a specific directory and successfully exploit this vulnerability to execute malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2017-10936|2024-09-17T03:08:03.979Z -- zte -- zxcdn-sns
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in all versions prior to V4.01.01 of the ZTE ZXCDN-SNS product allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the aoData parameter, resulting in the disclosure of database information.

item.title: CVE-2024-22069|2024-08-08T07:54:50.319Z -- zte -- zxv10%20xt802
item.description: There is a permission and access control vulnerability of ZTE's ZXV10 XT802/ET301 product.Attackers with common permissions can log in the terminal web and change the password of the administrator illegally by intercepting requests to change the passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-08-01T22:35:34.708Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-20T06:20:44.058Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-06-04T17:52:44.293Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-26T20:10:48.349Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T14:49:04.602Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-08-02T11:25:19.252Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22069|2024-08-08T13:07:14.051Z -- zte -- zxv10%20xt802
item.description: There is a permission and access control vulnerability of ZTE's ZXV10 XT802/ET301 product.Attackers with common permissions can log in the terminal web and change the password of the administrator illegally by intercepting requests to change the passwords.
